website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive mixture of a wide variety of all natural nuts, seeds, grains, fruits, and veggies, that combine to form a protein-rich, vitamin-packed, and all-around tasty blend that mice will enjoy exploring and eating.
pros: Sunflower seeds, oats, peanuts, and brown rice are the first 4 ingredients
Free of worthless filler seeds and hay
A mix of tasty pieces, including blueberry, strawberry, and apple
cons: Choosy mice may forage for their favorite snacks, while ignoring other ingredients

customer_reviews.title: It's the best
customer_reviews.text: My pet rats absolutely love this stuff. It's out of stock alot and now we know why! It's the best for them to be healthy and live the longest.
customer_reviews.author: Tamreece13

customer_reviews.title: terrible and one package was slit
customer_reviews.text: terrible ....one was slit, not taking a chance and food looks expired... the other one i usually buy is sold out and took a chance on this one and its terrible sorry
customer_reviews.author: millie

customer_reviews.title: my mice love !
customer_reviews.text: my two female mice love this, they especially like the mini sunflower seeds ! they do pick out some of it but i mix it with pellet food so this is great to mix with any other pellet food.
customer_reviews.author: lisa acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Great value for size and price.
customer_reviews.text: I have the world's PICKIEST Squirrel.. it's taken him Nearly 3weeks before he finally started eating this.im pleased with it,Ozzie may think it's Meh!
customer_reviews.author: celestetfelice

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: My pet rat LOVED this stuff. Great tasty product. Like a great treat and food
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn

customer_reviews.title: Seed mix
customer_reviews.text: One rat likes it the other doesnt. Not a fan of the dried corn in it, as it can cause mold issues. Most of the mix gets wasted
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Reaves

customer_reviews.title: but they need and love a good variety so this was perfect
customer_reviews.text: I feed my rats a high quality pellet diet, but they need and love a good variety so this was perfect. The ingredients aren't junk like some seed mixes, and it lets them forage and stuff their little happy faces. They seem to like everything in the mix. I give it to them a few nights a week and the bowl is always empty by morning.
customer_reviews.author: megmaholm

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My rats love this food and comes in resealable packaging which makes it easy to handle
customer_reviews.author: Edward Mason

customer_reviews.title: Our mouse loves this food! I have also noticed ...
customer_reviews.text: Our mouse loves this food! I have also noticed that it has greatly decreased the urine smell in his cage.
customer_reviews.author: Ragy

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Use
customer_reviews.text: Turns out it DOES contain peanuts, not listed in the description here. Other than that seems like a decent mix for pet rats.
customer_reviews.author: RoJoel93

customer_reviews.title: Not for my critters
customer_reviews.text: I wont buy this product again. Not for my use. It is 50% or more sunflower seeds. So unless this is the mixture you are looking for, buy something else. .
customer_reviews.author: Sam F

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice variety (sometimes is hard to find rat food at my pet store) and great price.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: My rats don't dig it.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 "Fancy" rats. They'll nibble at a few of the things in here, but in general this purchase was a waste for me. There doesn't appear to be anything wrong. They just don't like hit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Matt Landrum

customer_reviews.title: About 1/4 or more went to waste, but a younger rat my enjoy
customer_reviews.text: My rats not a big fan. About 1/4 or more went to waste, but a younger rat my enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: The mice like it!
customer_reviews.text: The 2 mice eat it but leave the sunflower seeds until I starve them a little. It is the last thing that they eat, They really like the shrimp and little puffy things. I would recommend it to other rodent owners.
customer_reviews.author: Lee S

customer_reviews.title: Small but tasty
customer_reviews.text: The rats loved it, but it is such a small bag. :/
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Soy free
customer_reviews.text: My ratties LOVE this. I add steel cut oats and dried fruit to it to make it last longer and give them extra variety, but even when I don't add the extras, they still gobble it up
customer_reviews.author: wafflenerfy

customer_reviews.title: no ick
customer_reviews.text: My guys didn't like this. I began putting it outside the chipmunks love it!!! For wild animals yes...pets no way.
customer_reviews.author: J. Buke

customer_reviews.title: Messy but yummy?  A good treat
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good product, the rats have been eating it, and everyone is in good health. Mine just want to dig through it to get their favorite little bit, so I'm tired of having seed mixes thrown out of the cage bars. If I get seed again at any point, I'll get this one again, as it appears the PET STORE variety of this mix contains the soy we *don't* want. However, unless you have to do seed for some reason, I'd advise a good pellet formula for rats; plus fresh food.
customer_reviews.author: Jens

customer_reviews.title: My mice love this! Especially the pumpkin seeds
customer_reviews.text: My mice love this! Especially the pumpkin seeds. Also, the price is great for how much food comes in the package.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Rat did not like it
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review for my rat who will not eat this. Not sure what it is about the product but I will not be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Traversino

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good product for my mouse, but not for my rat.
customer_reviews.author: JanieP

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Mice eat it. They like it. What more can I say about mouse food? I added almonds and organic cereal puffs to it too.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great, but messy
customer_reviews.text: The rats live it, but you will get a huge mess from the sunflower shells.
customer_reviews.author: alwaysOrganizing

customer_reviews.title: Great for a picky mouse
customer_reviews.text: This food was great for my mouse who was a very picky eater. He also had allergies that went away after I switched him to this. It was very cute to see him pick out all of the shrimp puffs to eat first!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: ... is less than a regular store and our rats love it.
customer_reviews.text: This item is less than a regular store and our rats love it.
customer_reviews.author: anna kotowski

customer_reviews.title: It's soy free and filler free
customer_reviews.text: I love this rat food, thhrough re-search and talking with people, it has been found out that soy is causing mammory tumors and other tumors in rats. So for a long time I had to make my own rat food, now I can buy my own rat food!.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My rattie babes liked it well enough but the mix was mostly sunflower seeds. Not exactly well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Love this mix. My rats normally eat oxbow. However I have noticed they love to eat seeds. If i put those seeds and oxbow they will dig up to get to the seeds and they will eat oxbow at the end. This mix contain lots of peanuts and sunflower and pumpkin seed so i just give it as a treat. I will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: mania

customer_reviews.title: Rat approved!
customer_reviews.text: There is very little waste with this food. My rat likes almost everything in it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, non-picky rats won't eat
customer_reviews.text: My rats love all kinds of sunflower seeds, but are unwilling to eat these ones unless they are starving. That is suspicious... Despite it being filled with what I consider good stuff, my rats are only excited to eat the pumpkin seeds. The rest they will eat if they are starving (if this is the only thing in the cage for a whole day). This is supposed to be treats! But my rats much prefer Oxbow, native earth, mazuri, or the walmart BLOCKS. Obviously this is low low quality. This is not worth the money. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: moses

customer_reviews.title: Our ratty loves this blend!
customer_reviews.text: Our ratty loves this blend & I like to mix a little with their regular food. So far, he has eaten everything and doesn't leave anything to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Jess_Benoit

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My rats adore this food, a great variety for them containing a lot more of what they will eat as opposed to standard food with the pellets and millet they won't touch. It's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sabeth Moonslayer

customer_reviews.title: Good as a mix in
customer_reviews.text: By itself this food is too much fat for rats and as the bag states it is a food and treat in one, though it is more treat. I mix this with oxbow regal rat adult food and found it much more appropriate for their diet as far as petstore bought food goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: F.M. Brown's Tropical Carnival Gourmet Bird Food for Parrots, African Greys, and Conures Under 13", Probiotics for Digestive Health, Vitamin-Nutrient Fortified Daily Diet
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Tropical| Size:2 lbBrown’s Tropical Carnival Natural Pet Mouse and Rat Fortified Daily Diet is a vitamin-nutrient-fortified food and treat all-in-one. This premium gourmet food is specially formulated for the dietary needs of mice and rats and is jam-packed with a medley of delicacies including protein-rich shrimp. Your companion pet will find it irresistible.
feature_bullets: Vitamin-Nutrient-Fortified: Specially Formulated For The Daily Dietary Needs Of Mice And Rats
Support Good Digestion: Omega Fatty Acids And Beneficial Bacteria Help Stimulate Good Digestion So Your Pet Can Get The Most Out Of Our Nutrient-Rich Ingredients
Over 30 Unique Gourmet Ingredients: Fruits, Vegetables, Nuts And More Combine To Ensure Your Mouse Or Rat Receives The Complex Carbs, Vitamins, Minerals, And Fiber They Need
Immune System Support: Farm Fresh Veggies Contain Antioxidants That Help Maintain A Healthy Immune System
Usa Produced And Packaged: Feel Good Knowing You Are Feeding Your Pet Locally Produced Food
